name: YOYO Doll - Dress up Games
description:
Welcome players to enter YOYO Doll — Doll dress up&Character Maker offline game, come and design the cutest doll with me!

Here, you can have a shining wardrobe, a cute gashapon with a burst of girly hearts! A variety of dressing styles, whether it's court dress, cute LOLITA or the mature style of the royal sister can be freely matched as you like. In addition, you can also DIY backgrounds for your dolls, switch various character actions, take pictures of her/him, and make beautiful avatars and wallpapers! Use your imagination, so many ways to play, it's up to you!

【Game Features】
1.Character selection: According to your needs, choose the boy or girl you want!
2.Change style: Two-dimensional dress up game, with various styles of clothing, rich styles, many hairstyles, expressions, and skin colors for you to choose!
3.Scene creation: After creating the character dollify , the player can choose the appropriate background according to the style of the doll. Different backgrounds, different doll shapes, and various pictures are composed!
4.Dynamic characters: different shapes, different backgrounds with various interesting actions, come to take photos and save!
5.Scenario simulation: Give full play to your imagination and creativity, Imagine your plot, become a genius image writer and shine in the audience!
6.Unlock the Gacha: There are more girly-hearted Gachas in the game. Click the Gacha to unlock more outfits together!
7.All free: 100% free of all game content!

Style selection-become a character maker! Lots of customization options! Change the doll's clothes, hair and color scheme, from hair to eyes, from clothes to shoes, everything can be customized to make your personal dolls style truly shine. Personalized avatar stickers make your own character! With cute dolls, expressing yourself has never been easier!
